title: Collar, 1670–85
medium:
Medium: linen, metal-wrapped silk
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Man's collar of Brussels-style lace in a pattern of stylized floral and foliated forms in a large scale symmetrical arrangement and connected by brides. Modes: venises, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Collar, 1670–85.
1670–85. Medium: linen, metal-wrapped silk
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-91.
